title: Collaborative development of learning science-based online language education resources

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and three or more years of language education experience
context.additional_context: Asynchronous learning resource development competency enhancement program for current elementary language practitioners, optimized for smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Execute a three-stage online educational resource design process (literature analysis–production–evaluation) applying Learning Sciences (SoL) principles.
Collaborate with experts from other institutions to co-create blended asynchronous learning modules.
Acquire technical competencies to produce effective language learning content even in smartphone environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
